attributes.action: Uk should boycott Japanese olymics in view of continued slaughter of dolphins and whales for meat
attributes.additional_details: The UK should boycott the Japanese Olympics due to the continued slaughter ( especially dolphin drive hunting at Taiji) of over 2000 dolphins, porpoises and whales each year. Further the UK goverment should use every opportunity it can too put every pressure it can, on the Japanese goverment to ban these barbaric medieval practices in line with being a modern civilised society.
